TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IStyleConnector

summary.span: Provides methods used internally by the WPF XAML parser to attach events and event setters in compiled XAML.

span.span: Provides methods used internally by the WPF XAML parser to attach events and event setters in compiled XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別不是用於由 WPF XAML 標記編譯器以外的任何項目。The class is not intended for use by anything other than the WPF XAML markup compiler. 它是由產生的程式碼會執行之範本或類似的 factory 模型牽涉到的標記事件連接參考。It is referenced by generated code that does event wiring for markup that involves templates or a similar factory model.

summary.span: Attaches events on event setters and templates in compiled content.
